title: Unifi Staking & Reward Claim added to BSC
body:
The proposal is for Unifi to split the UNFI pool up (50% ETH blockchain; 50% BSC blockchain).

Current users that have UNFI staked would be whitelisted to have 1st priority in moving 50% of what they currently have staked in the UNFI pool on ETH over to BSC. This would allow holders to move tokens if they choose to & then be able to claim on BSC.  Then after the whitelist per
author: 0xE82a43687829D003b91250f041bA22163ba6eaC1
